requirements.summary: Force a production rebuild/redeploy from the current codebase and ensure a new live URL is produced.
acceptanceCriteria: A fresh production deployment is executed from the current codebase (no code changes required).
After deployment completes, the system provides a single, copy-pastable live production URL for the new deployment.
The provided URL loads successfully and renders the app without runtime errors.

file_operations.description: Create a non-user-facing redeploy trigger file whose contents can be updated (e.g., timestamp/nonce) only when needed to force CI/CD to run a full rebuild and redeploy. Keep it out of the UI and do not reference it from application code; this change exists solely to trigger a new production deployment.
